jx.jx_en_mean: as close to being accurate as makes no difference
used to express defiance or rejection of someone or something previously mentioned

jx.jx_cn_mean: (英，非正式)根本没有，一点也不

jx.jx_en_mean: praise someone or something so unenthusiastically as to imply condemnation
jx.jx_cn_mean: 冷冷地表扬（其实意味着谴责）
(非正式)［用于表示强烈的否定］要是…我就不是人

lj.lj_ls: 我要是知道我就不是人。

jx.jx_en_mean: (informal)have no value or validity at all

jx.jx_cn_mean: (非正式)［用于表示惊讶］哎呀，见鬼

lj.lj_ly: I am damn well going to file charges against him.
lj.lj_ls: 我肯定要对他提出控告

derivation.yuyuan_name: Middle English: from Old French dam(p)ner, from Latin dam(p)nare 'inflict loss on', from damnum 'loss, damage'

encyclopedia.content: damn，词语，有及物动词，名词，感叹词，形容词，副词等几种词性。下面分别详细介绍。

entry.tran: (表示愤怒或不耐烦)该死，可恶，他妈的
entry.def: Damn ,damn it, and dammit are used by some people to express anger or impatience.

example.ex: Don't be flippant, damn it! This is serious.
example.tran: 别不当回事，该死！这可不是闹着玩儿的事。

entry.tran: (用于加强语气)该死的，可恶的，十足的，完全的
entry.def: Damn is used by some people to emphasize what they are saying.

example.ex: There's not a damn thing you can do about it now.
example.tran: 现在你对此做什么都完全无济于事。

entry.def: If you say that a person or a news report damns something such as a policy or action, you mean that they are very critical of it.

example.ex: ...a sensational book in which she damns the ultra-right party.
example.tran: 她在其中大力鞭挞该极右党派的耸人听闻的书

example.ex: ...a report damning the chocolate advertising people for targeting women in their campaigns.
example.tran: 谴责巧克力广告企划人员在宣传中以女性为目标人群的一份报告

entry.def: If you say that someone does not give a damn about something, you are emphasizing that they do not care about it at all.
People use damn near to emphasize that what they are saying is not actually true, but is very close to being true.

example.ex: That's a question damn near every woman who ever lived has had to answer for herself.
example.tran: 那几乎是每个有过生活经历的女人都必须要自己回答的问题。

entry.def: Some people say as near as damn it or as near as dammit to emphasize that what they have said is almost completely accurate, but not quite.

example.ex: It's as near as damn it the same thing...
The stadium will be as near as dammit empty.
example.tran: 体育场里将几乎空无一人。

sentences.sentence: "his promise is not worth a damn"

means.word_mean: 1. wish harm upon; invoke evil upon;

sentences.sentence: "I'll be damned (or blessed or darned or goddamned) if I'll do any such thing"
"he's a damn (or goddam or goddamned) fool"

list.explanation: 没价值的，没用的，没意义的

example.en: This pen is not worth a damn.

auth_sentence.content: Don't you think that is mighty damn scary?
auth_sentence.res_content: Don't you think that is mighty damn scary?
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Don't you think that is mighty damn scary?

auth_sentence.content: Wingate told me frankly I was a damn fool.
auth_sentence.res_content: Wingate told me frankly I was a damn fool.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Wingate told me frankly I was a damn fool.

auth_sentence.content: Selling junk suits Big Business - damn the consequences.
auth_sentence.res_content: Selling junk suits Big Business - damn the consequences.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Selling junk suits Big Business - damn the consequences.

sentences.en: I feel a damn sight better than I did yesterday.
He would know damn well better on time tonight or I am leaving without him.
sentences.cn: 他应该明白今晚得准时来, 否则我就自个走。

sentences.en: Don't lie to me.You know damn well what was happening.
sentences.cn: 别瞒我了, 你压根就很清楚发生了什么事。

sentences.en: I knew damn well what he was going to say.
sentences.cn: 我非常清楚他要说什么。

sentences.en: You'll damn well do as you're told!
sentences.cn: 告诉你做什么你他妈的就做什么！
所有的罪犯都该咒骂吗?

sentences.en: He had rather be damned with Plato than saved with those who anathematized him.
sentences.cn: 他宁可让自己的灵魂与柏拉图一道被罚入地狱, 也不愿和谴责他的人们一起升入天国。

sentences.en: The play was damned by the reviewers.
sentences.cn: 这部戏被评论家们批评得一无是处。

sentences.en: The department's review damned the whole system.
sentences.cn: 该部门的评述严厉批评了整个系统。

sentences.en: She damned herself with one stupid remark.
sentences.cn: 她被自己的一句蠢话毁了。

sentences.en: I don't care a damn what he does.
sentences.cn: 他干什么我一点儿也不在乎。

jushi.english: We should not totally damn a man's character for a few faults.
jushi.chinese: 我们不应当抓住一点点毛病就把一个人说得一无是处。

jushi.english: Chapman's remarkable preface if written by a modern author would at once damn his book.
jushi.chinese: 查普曼那篇出色的序文要是换一位现代作者来写，顿时就会毁了他的书。

jushi.english: He had rather be damned with Plato than saved with those who anathematized him.
jushi.chinese: 他宁可让自己的灵魂与柏拉图一道被罚入地狱，也不愿和谴责他的人们一起升入天国。
